Text:
Many thanks again for all these great comics you've been sharing/scanning/translating :)

Do you have copies of corto maltese in english? Or, if they're not available, do you know of any scanlation project of Pratt's works? They're very hard to find in english

Until now, I've only found these:
The Early Years 
Fable of Venice
Ballad of the Salt Sea
Sorry, but thats about all thats out in scanned format.
Please help , several stuck at 96.6 % since the very beginning. Nice releases. Thanks.
There are 15 seeders of this at the moment. All i can do are to tell you to keep trying, or check if you got issues on your end.
